Class EllipseLike

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.shapes.GeometricShape
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.shapes.EllipseLike
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class EllipseLike
extends GeometricShape
    Geometric shape with curved sides.

    1.0
    Author:

        Creates an ellipse-like shape from the given parameters.

        x - x coordinate of the center of ellipse-like shape

        horizontalRadius - horizontal radius of the ellipse-like
        verticalRadius - vertical radius of the ellipse-like shape
